name: Metrognome
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] While you have 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones with the same Pendulum Scale, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the Pendulum Scale x 100, and can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Destroy all cards in the Pendulum Zones.
pend_desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 other card in a Pendulum Zone; this card's Pendulum Scale becomes equal to that card's, until the end of this turn.
monster_desc: While you have 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones with the same Pendulum Scale, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the Pendulum Scale x 100, and can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Destroy all cards in the Pendulum Zones.
